channel.title: Comments on: Holiday Travel and Exporting PearDeck Data to Desmos
channel.description: iteration, making, building, and coding in education

item.title: By: Evan Weinberg
item.dc:creator: Evan Weinberg
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2017/01/09/holiday-travel-and-exporting-peardeck-data-to-desmos/#comment-493">Dan Meyer</a>.
The ability to export the responses from the deck was key to my plans - check out my post on Notes to the Future to see why. Desmos activity builder certainly could have handled this task otherwise.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Dan Meyer.

The ability to export the responses from the deck was key to my plans – check out my post on Notes to the Future to see why. Desmos activity builder certainly could have handled this task otherwise.

item.title: By: Dan Meyer
item.dc:creator: Dan Meyer
item.description: Any reason you wouldn't create a movable point in Desmos on top of an image of the map?
item.content:encoded: Any reason you wouldn’t create a movable point in Desmos on top of an image of the map?
